text: Lori Beth Denberg (born February 2, 1976) is an American comedian and actress. She was an original cast member on All That on Nickelodeon. She also played Lydia on The Steve Harvey Show. She was born in Northridge, Los Angeles, California. ==References== Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Comedians from Los Angeles Category:1976 births Category:Living people
title: Lori Beth Denberg
